thread.title: BRIEF-Procad Signs LoI With Groclin On Sale Of 61.9% Stake Of Des Art

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Procad Signs LoI With Groclin On Sale Of 61.9% Stake Of Des Art
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - PROCAD SA:
* SAID ON THURSDAY THE COMPANY SIGNED LETTER OF INTENT (LOI) WITH GROCLIN SA ON SALE OF STAKE IT HOLDS IN DES ART SP. Z O.O.
* PROCAD CURRENTLY OWNS 61.9 PERCENT STAKE IN DES ART * LOI PROVIDES GROCLIN WITH 3 MONTHS EXCLUSIVITY IN NEGOTIATIONS
Source text for Eikon:
Further companies coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
